alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 15 at 1:20AM MST until November 15 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Areas of fog with patchy dense fog and visibility one quarter mile or less. * WHERE...The Southeast New Mexico Plains, northwestern Permian Basin, Upper Trans Pecos, eastern Culberson County, Davis Mountains, and Marfa Plateau. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
